name: Students Caught Having Fun at Skyline High School, Police Called
brief: A group of students were caught during a snowball fight on November 29th, a police case has been filed and the Sammamish Police Department is on the lookout for the perpetrators.
author: Derek Leeman

name: IBO to Require Competency Test in Latin
brief: Along with this, the IBO are to add more strict requirements for new IB Diploma Path students to keep up with "power creep".
author: Garry Kidman

name: Issaquah School District Awards College Board with "Most Moral Non-Profit" Award
brief: The Issaquah School District recently announced College Board as the winner of their recent "Most Moral Non-Profit" competition.
author: Derek Leeman

name: Issaquah to update speed limit on I-90
brief: The city of Issaquah recently announced an update to the speed limit on I-90 to counteract continual failure to meet ticket quotas.
author: Derek Leeman

name: Puget Sound Energy displays new method to reduce power strain on generators
brief: In a now-deleted tweet they unveiled a possibly controversial method to stop the issues with generator strain.
author: Derek Leeman
